Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a #Bow Shooting Gallery#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Ice Cavern# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: I've heard Sploosh Kaboom is a tricky game.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Lens of Truth#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that monarchy is a terrible system of governance.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Small Key# can be found at #Kakariko Village#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Small Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #Dampé's Grave#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #the Lost Woods#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Deku Tree# hoards #a Small Key#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Small Key#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Death Mountain Crater#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Small Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Zora Tunic#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find a small #Fairy Fountain#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that Flare Dancers do not fear Goron-crafted blades.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Water Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #a Small Key#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #an Ocarina# can be found at #the Lost Woods#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Man in Green's House#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: These hints can be quite useful. This is an exception.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Heart Container#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Kokiri Forest#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #the Giant's Knife#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Spirit Temple# hoards #a Small Key#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Ruto's Letter# can be found at #Death Mountain Crater#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Mask of Truth# yields #a Strength Upgrade#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #the Gerudo Card#.
